publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2838 Iain Gray: Final Report of the Homelessness Task Force—That the Parliament welcomes the Scottish Executive’s commitment to preventing and alleviating homelessness in Scotland and endorses the Executive’s pledge to implement the wide-ranging recommendations contained in the final report of the Homelessness Task Force, Homelessness: An Action Plan for Prevention and Effective Response. Supported by: Ms Margaret Curran*
